roleset.name: stipulation prior to an agreement
roleset.note: PRECONDITION-N NOTES: Based on ontonouns. (from precondition.01-n)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Although Senator Murkowski does seem to say she does have a precondition, which is that the insurance needs to be stabilized in order for her to vote on the tax cut.
example.arg: which is that the insurance needs to be
stabilized in order for her to vote on the tax

roleset.name: cause to be in the required condition beforehand
roleset.note: Based on AMR data. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

role.descr: topic, preconditioned to, for, or about

example.name: nominal with odd arg2
example.text: God started his preconditioning of humanity towards evil in the Garden of Eden.

example.name: verbal
example.text: The short period of ischaemia preconditioned the heart to survive the more sustained ischaemic period and the reperfusion that followed.
example.arg: to survive the more sustained ischaemic period and the reperfusion that followed.
